To clean the inside of a bottle, jar or vase. The bristles of the toothbrush can be used to clean dirt and residue from the inside of the bottle or jar.
To clean and shine hard surfaces such as tiles, countertops, and mirrors. The bristles can be used to scrub away dirt and grime from these surfaces.
To clean the inside of a car or bike. The bristles can be used to clean hard to reach areas of a car or bike such as the dashboard, steering wheel, and headlights.
To clean and remove stickers from surfaces. The bristles can be used to gently scrape away stickers from surfaces without damaging them.
To clean and remove stains from clothing, fabrics or shoes. The bristles can be used to clean minor stains and dirt from clothing, fabrics or shoes.
